mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 1485) for an order placed by Don Gilbreth for 3 orders of 100 two color jumbos for a performance by George Jones, Melba Montgomery, and Connie Smith at the Columbia Township Auditorium on July 9, and the Greenville Memorial Auditorium on July 14, and the Bell Auditorium on July 16. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
